cta.description: Let's build Israel's democratic future together

hero.title: About the Project
hero.description: The "Dream Team" project is an innovative initiative to change the political system in Israel through direct democracy, full transparency, and governmental professionalism.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: We believe that the current political system in Israel requires fundamental change. Our goal is to create a new model that directly and transparently connects citizens with the government.
mission.description2: The project is based on principles of participatory democracy, governmental professionalism, and full accountability to the public.
mission.description3: We aim to create an efficient, transparent, and accountable government that will lead Israel to a better future.

principles.title: Core Principles
principles.description: The project is based on four central principles that guide all our activities

directMandate.title: Direct Mandate and Participatory Democracy
directMandate.description: Direct connection between the public and government ministries through direct election of ministers

transparency.title: Increased Transparency and Accountability
transparency.description: Public oversight and objective external evaluation of government performance

professionalism.title: Professionalism and Broad Representation
professionalism.description: Ensuring appointments based on qualifications and broad, not sectoral, interest representation

stability.title: Stability and Coordination
stability.description: Creating coordination and authority mechanisms to ensure coherent and stable government functioning

community.title: Community and Partnership
community.description: Building an active community of citizens involved in the democratic process

innovation.title: Technological Innovation
innovation.description: Utilizing advanced technology to improve the election process and citizen engagement

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have questions or ideas to share, we would love to hear from you. Please contact us via the form below.

legal.title: Legal Information
legal.description: All legal information related to the "Dream Team" project, including terms of service and privacy policy, is available here.

securityPrivacy.title: Security and Privacy
securityPrivacy.description: We are committed to protecting the privacy and security of our users' information. All information is securely stored and encrypted.

technicalSupport.title: Technical Support
technicalSupport.description: If you encounter technical issues or need assistance using the platform, our support team is here to help.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: The 'Dream Team' project team is composed of experts in various fields, including policy, technology, and society. We are committed to creating positive change in Israel's political system.

techExperts.description: Software engineers and information security experts
